department.en: Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering

goal.ch: 本課程目的在於介紹數據科學，教導學生如何從資料收集、管理、統整分析至最終的圖表呈現。課程除了基礎統計分析說明之外，亦會介紹多種機器學習演算法，並且帶領學生使用 R 與 Python 分析生醫資料。
goal.en: This course provides a general introduction of the essential elements of data science, including data collection and management, summarizing and visualizing data, utilizing basic ideas of statistical inference, and machine learning. Students will have hand-on practices using Python and R

outline.ch:
1.課程介紹
2.用R language繪圖I
3.用R language繪圖II
4.數據科學介紹
5.認識你的資料
6.資料前處理
7.頻繁資料探勘方法
8.進階頻繁資料探勘方法
9.期中考
10.資料倉儲
11.分類: 基本概念
12.分類: 進階概念
13.分群: 基本概念
14.分群: 進階概念
15.離群值分析
16.線上分析前處理
17.期末專題報告
18.期末考
outline.en:
1.Course introduction
2.plots I (R language)
3.plots II (R language)
4.Introduction of data science
5.Getting to know your data
6.Data preprocessing
7.Frequent itemset mining methods
8.Advanced pattern mining
9.Midterm exam
10.Data warehousing
11.Classification: basic concept
12.Advanced classification
13.Cluster analysis: basic concept
14.Cluster analysis: advanced
15.Outliers and outlier analysis
16.Online analytical processing
17.Project presentation
18.Final exam

textbook.ch:
R for Data Science
by Garrett Grolemund, Hadley Wickham
Released December 2016
Publisher(s): O'Reilly Media, Inc.
ISBN: 9781491910399

Introduction to Machine Learning with Python
by Andreas C. Müller, Sarah Guido
Released October 2016
Publisher(s): O'Reilly Media, Inc.
ISBN: 9781449369415
textbook.en:
R for Data Science
by Garrett Grolemund, Hadley Wickham
Released December 2016
Publisher(s): O'Reilly Media, Inc.
ISBN: 9781491910399

Introduction to Machine Learning with Python
by Andreas C. Müller, Sarah Guido
Released October 2016
Publisher(s): O'Reilly Media, Inc.
ISBN: 9781449369415

Midterm exam: 30%

Project: 20%

flexDiscription.ch: 因應疫情需求，若疫情嚴重時改為視訊授課。
flexDiscription.en: The course will be online teaching, if the COVID-19 outbreak gets worst.
